description: You're just three minutes away from this decadent, chocolate chip studded, vegan vanilla ice cream topped, single-serving pumpkin mug cake.
name: Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Mug Cake
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup whole wheat pastry flour (could sub all-purpose flour)
2 tablespoons unflavored soy or almond milk
1 tablespoon coconut oil (or whatever baking oil you've got on hand)

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the flour, pumpkin pie spice, baking powder and salt together in medium-sized coffee mug.
Add the maple syrup, milk, pumpkin puree, and coconut oil.
Microwave for 60 seconds. If it doesn't look done after 60 seconds, zap it for another thirty seconds.
Serve with a spoon and optionally with a scoop of vegan vanilla ice cream.
